nodes.text: Barrisk Favvin was a male Gotal ISB agent. On the planet Kupoh, Migg Birkhit contacted him to meet somewhere due to the fact he had important information about Drusil Bephorin and his company. Later, he saw Migg's unconscious body with two other people, and attempted to stop the group but the astromech droid R2-D2 stunned him. Luke Skywalker and Nakari Kelen captured and interrogated him in a Kupohan hotel room.
